greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{d|n} tau(d)^d, where tau(n) is the number of divisors of n.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..719
mathematica: a[n_] := DivisorSum[n, DivisorSigma[0, #]^# &]; Array[a, 24] (* _Amiram Eldar_, May 09 2021 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, May 09 2021
